articles.title: Here are the Mass. residents who made the new Forbes list of 400 richest Americans
articles.description:
These nine Bay Staters found spots amongst the wealthiest Americans.

The post Here are the Mass. residents who made the new Forbes list of 400 richest Americans appeared first on Boston.com.
summary: Nine Massachusetts residents are listed among the 400 richest Americans by Forbes.
Notable names include Abigail Johnson and Robert Kraft, showcasing local wealth.
The presence of wealthy individuals may influence Boston's economy and philanthropy.

articles.title: Wall Street coasts to the finish of its best week in the last 5
articles.description:
Stocks have rallied with expectations that the Federal Reserve will cut its main interest rate for the first time this year at its meeting next week.

The post Wall Street coasts to the finish of its best week in the last 5 appeared first on Boston.com.
summary: Stocks rallied this week amid expectations of a Federal Reserve interest rate cut.
This marks Wall Street's best week in five weeks, boosting investor confidence.
Potential rate cuts could lower borrowing costs for Boston residents and businesses.
